title: Aaron Hernandez ////// 32
description:
Aaron Hernandez ////// 32


Serial killer football player, what? This week we close the garage door and open up the refrigerator and discuss cold blooded killer Aaron Hernandez and his crimes. Did he kill to cover up a double homicide? Is he a thug, a serial killer or a psycho who uses anger to aim his trigger finger?


Beer of the week - G-Bot by New England Brewing Company

Garage grade - 4 1/2 out of 5 bottle caps

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
author: truecrimegarage@gmail.com (TRUE CRIME GARAGE)
